title: Classical tradition in St. Michael ivory relief

content.question: The work shown is a sixth-century ivory relief depicting Saint Michael the Archangel. Which elements tie the work to the Classical tradition? Which elements deviate from the Classical tradition?

frqParts.text: The work shown is a sixth-century ivory relief depicting Saint Michael the Archangel. Which elements tie the work to the Classical tradition? Which elements deviate from the Classical tradition?

unit.text: 3: Early Europe and Colonial Americas, 200 - 1750 CE

topic.text: 3.2: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Early European and Colonial American Art

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Explain how a specific work of art (or group of related works of art) demonstrates continuity and/or change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
